powerspec module¶

powerspec.boxwrap()¶
powerspec.boxwrap_double()¶
powerspec.brute_force_ft_particles()¶

compute the Fourier transform of the input particle distribution by brute force.

powerspec.cic_grid()¶

return a binning of densities according to cloud-in-cell binning.

powerspec.cic_grid_weights()¶

return a binning of densities according to cloud-in-cell binning. (N.B. when using weights it is best to use double precision.)

powerspec.fft_grid()¶
powerspec.fft_grid_double()¶
powerspec.plan_fft()¶
powerspec.plan_fft_double()¶
powerspec.power_grid()¶
powerspec.power_grid_double()¶
